#FizzBuzz problem:

```{r}
for (C in 1:100) {
 if (C %% 3 == 0 & C %% 5 == 0) {print("FizzBuzz")}
 else if (C %% 3 == 0) {print("Fizz")}
 else if (C %% 5 == 0) {print("Buzz")}
 else print(C)
}
```
